duties_responsibilities.duty: Work through the deal processes cradle to grave and execute sourced deals
Perform company/industry due diligence and conduct financial modeling/analysis
Monitor existing portfolio companies and evaluate platform and add-on acquisitions as well as potential exit opportunities
Assist the team with ad hoc projects

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree with exceptional academic achievement, GPA over 3.5, SAT/ACT scores required. 2+ years of investment banking experience required. Open to any associates looking to lateral that have private credit experience.
